Week1 Solution 練習 library(dplyr);library(readxl);library(ggplot2) setwd("~/Documents/110-1/Spatiotemporal/Data") employee = read_excel("employee.xlsx") Salary differences in gender(F/M) among departments Q1 = employee %>% group_by(Dept, Gender) %>% summarise(Salary = mean(Salary)) %>% na.omit() ggplot(Q1, aes(x = Dept, y = Salary, fill = Gender)) + geom_bar(stat="identity", position = "dodge") + theme_minimal() Which department provides a better career path? Q2 = employee %>% filter(!is.na(Years) & !is.na(Salary) & !is.na(Dept)) ggplot(Q2, aes(x = Years, y = Salary, col = Dept)) + geom_line() + theme_minimal() 作業 Do the residential buildings with more rooms have higher prices (stratified by building states) among the regions of Taipei City? library(dplyr);library(ggplot2) setwd("~/Documents/110-1/Spatiotemporal/Data") land = read.csv("a_lvr_land_a.csv") %>% slice(-1L) %>% filter(主要用途 == "住家用") %>% filter(建物型態 == "公寓(5樓含以下無電梯)" | 建物型態 == "住宅大樓(11層含以上有電梯)" | 建物型態 == "透天厝" | 建物型態 == "華廈(10層含以下有電梯)") %>% mutate(建物型態 = replace(建物型態, 建物型態 == "公寓(5樓含以下無電梯)", "公寓"), 建物型態 = replace(建物型態, 建物型態 == "住宅大樓(11層含以上有電梯)", "住宅大樓"), 建物型態 = replace(建物型態, 建物型態 == "華廈(10層含以下有電梯)", "華廈")) %>% mutate(建物現況格局.房 = as.numeric(建物現況格局.房)) %>% filter(建物現況格局.房 != 0) %>% mutate(單價元平方公尺 = as.numeric(單價元平方公尺), 台北市 = case_when(鄉鎮市區 == "士林區" | 鄉鎮市區 == "北投區" ~ "北區", 鄉鎮市區 == "文山區" ~ "南區", 鄉鎮市區 == "大同區" | 鄉鎮市區 == "中正區" | 鄉鎮市區 == "中山區" | 鄉鎮市區 == "萬華區" ~ "西區", 鄉鎮市區 == "內湖區" | 鄉鎮市區 == "南港區" ~ "東區", 鄉鎮市區 == "大安區" | 鄉鎮市區 == "信義區" | 鄉鎮市區 == "松山區" ~ "中區")) %>% group_by(建物型態, 台北市, 建物現況格局.房) %>% summarise(平均單價 = mean(單價元平方公尺)) ggplot(land, aes(x = 建物現況格局.房, y = 平均單價, color = 台北市)) + geom_line() + theme_minimal() + facet_wrap(~ 建物型態) + scale_x_continuous(name = "建物現況格局(房)", breaks = 1:7) + scale_y_continuous(name = "平均單價", labels = scales::comma) + theme(text=element_text(family="GenYoGothicTW-N")) library(lessR);library(showtext) showtext_auto() Plot(data = land, x = 建物現況格局.房, y = 平均單價, xlab = "建物現況格局(房)", ylab = "平均單價", by = 台北市, by1 = 建物型態, run = TRUE, n_row = 2) ## [Trellis graphics from Deepayan Sarkar's lattice package]

Week2 Solution library(dplyr);library(readxl);library(ggplot2) setwd("~/Documents/110-1/Spatiotemporal/Data") employee = read_excel("employee.xlsx") # test Salary differences in gender(F/M) among departments Q1 = employee %>% group_by(Dept, Gender) %>% summarise(Salary = mean(Salary)) %>% na.omit() ggplot(Q1, aes(x = Dept, y = Salary, fill = Gender)) + geom_bar(stat="identity", position = "dodge") + theme_minimal()
